adminhelp.desc: Show help for an admin command, or list all cmds.

ban.desc: Ban a nick from using the bot.

blacklist.desc: Change pyvalexec's blacklist option, or  show the current value.

channels.desc: Show current channels that pyval is in.

getattr.desc: Retrieve the value of a pyval CommandFuncs  attribute. (ex: admins.channels)

join.desc: Join a channel or multiple channels (using a comma-separated list)

limitrate.desc: Change pyval's limitrate option, or show the current value.

me.desc: Make pyval perform an irc action (/ME <text>) in a channel.

msg.desc: Send a message to a nick or channel as pyvalbot.

part.desc: Part/Leave a channel or multiple channels (using a comma-separated list)

say.desc: Make pyvalbot respond to you with a message.

sendline.desc: Send a raw line to the irc server as pyvalbot.

setattr.desc: Set a pyval CommandFuncs attribute. (ex: !setattr admin.blacklist True)

shutdown.desc: Shut pyval down cleanly, disconnect and kill the process.

stats.desc: Show handled-count (number of commands handled), and uptime (time since startup)

unban.desc: Remove a nick from the banned list.

help.desc: list commands or show command help.

pyval.desc: say something to the pyval operator.
